entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Mine Centre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 11:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: NNW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Overcast. High zero.
entry.summary: Overcast. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
